title: The Republic of Tea – Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas - Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea Bundle – 36 Count Tea Bags Each
descriptions: Indulge in the flavors of the fall season with The Republic of Tea Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas Bundle! This delightful package includes 36 count tea bags each of Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea. The Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea is a naturally-caffeine free blend with the flavors of apple cider, cinnamon, and cloves, while the Caramel Apple Herbal Tea is a caffeine-free blend of sweet apples, vanilla, and South African Rooibos. Simply steep in boiling water for 5-7 minutes and enjoy a warm, comforting cup of tea. Perfect for accompanying the harvest season and as a dessert tea, these limited-edition teas are a must-have for any tea lover. Plus, the used tea bags can be added to compost or soil, making it an eco-friendly choice. Treat yourself to the taste of fall with this irresistible tea bundle!

Pair it with the equally delightful Caramel Apple Herbal Tea, a sweet and creamy blend of apples, vanilla, and South African Rooibos. Steep in boiling water for 5-7 minutes and experience the comforting taste of fall in every sip. Perfect for accompanying the harvest season or as a dessert tea. Plus, once you're done, you can even add the used tea bags to your compost or soil. Don't miss out on this limited-time offering!
